name: Chetaru UK Limited
tagline: We craft beautiful experience for the Web & Mobile
description:
Chetaru is an international web development agency, providing services in digital marketing, web and app design and development. Chetaru maintains competitive pricing and efficiency by having coding teams based at our production headquarters in Indore, Central West India and international strategy and content teams based within our operations headquarters in the UK. 
Chetaru has demonstrated solid growth in the first five years of trading, with special mention to the abundance of international clients that have been developed. Growth of the Indian Web Development Company has been largely down to Chetaru’s commitment to a fast, friendly service and producing high quality transparent work consistently, whilst always pushing the capabilities of technology. 
READ MORE...

locations.address: Business Central 2 Union Square Central Park
